Golden girls

By Zinzy Waleson Geene, last updated on November 26, 2022

When it comes to binging through an entire television series, I feel Anja and I are doing it right with this one. We began watching the 80s and 90s hit series The Golden Girls in the Summer of 2022, and we‚Äôre going at a rate of one episode at a time.

It is glorious.

My favorite things about the show so far:

  • Betty White was surprisingly sexy
  • The wordless shade that Dorothy throws just by making a certain phase is, to me, the best thing in comedy
  • I attribute this to the show‚Äôs age, but I love the fact that their comedy pauses last at minimum five times longer than any other sitcom I‚Äôve seen
  • It‚Äôs great to be reminded that, without this show, there would‚Äôve been no [[ Sex and the City ]]

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
